title: Champion Idee: Shred, the Gunslinger
body:
Alsooo ... ich hatte diese Idee für einen AD Ranged Assassin für die Mid Lane. Bis jetzt gibt es da ja nich wirklich viele(auch wenn es momentan modern ist ADC's in der Mitte zu spielen). Ich dachte an ein ähnliches Konzept wie Jhin. Also an einen Champion mit einer Pistole. Wäre zwar nichts neues aber ich fände zumindest das Design recht interessant und na ja ... ich gebe zu, dies wäre exakt ein champion für mich, da ich auf Assassins stehe und ich hier wohl meine Wunschvorstellung eines coolen Assassins zusammengestellt habe ... na ja auf jeden Fall ...

**PASSIVE: **
After a while of continously shooting the weapon will overheat and Shred becomes a melee champion for a few seconds. While overheated he gains 25/30/40% less damage and his Attack Damage is increased by 10%. 

Shred can't use his Q nor R while overheated.

**Q: BULLET WALTZ**
Shred shoots an explosive bullet in a targeted area, which deals physical damage. The bullet will continue jumping 2 times in the targeted direction. Shred can fire the bullet at any point within the range.

Without editing the targeted area the bullet will always jump in the direction away from Shred.
(Close to Viktor Laser :))

**W: FORCE OF THE WEAK**
Shred shoots 6 bullets in a targeted area and deals magic damage. For each enemy unit hit his next basic attack gains physical damage (Max. six times the value for one unit hit).

While overheated Shred will smash a small area with his weapon dealing magic damage. If he hits an enemy champion he will gain attack speed.

**E: HUMAN PROJECTILE**
After a short delay Shred will quickly dash in the targeted direction and will deal physical damage to each enemy unit hit. Shred will stop at the first champion hit. If he hits a champion, he will stop moving and loading a second jump. While loading a new jump a new direction can be set. If Shred moves while loading the spell will go on cooldown.

While overheated this spell becomes a targeted dash which deals physical damage and will knock the enemy a short distance back. In addition the cooldown will be lowered to 40% of it's normal cooldown. If the overheated phase is over the cooldown will be refunded.

**R: BULLET BARRAGE**
Shred targets one enemy champion with his gun and shoots a barrage of bullets at him, dealing physical damage over time. Shred will still be able to move freely while shooting. Casting any spell will stop the channel without the aftereffect. 

When he finishes the bullets in the enemys body will explode stunning him and dealing a low amount of physical damage in an area arround him. Shred's weapon will also overheat after ending the barrage.


LANE/ROLE: Mid Lane | AD Assassin

STRENGTHS: - good mid game - high mobility - good focus

WEAKNESSES: - low range - depends a lot on items - relativly weak late game
